name: Code Assist
description: Helps you with code review, writes logic, and assists in writing unit tests efficiently.

name: Poem Writer
description: Generates creative and emotional poems with rhyme, tone, and structure tailored to your input.

name: Grammar Fixer
description: Corrects grammar, punctuation, and sentence structure to improve clarity, tone, and readability effectively.

name: RAG Helper
description: Assists in retrieval-augmented generation tasks, improving document-based answers with precise referencing.

name: Prompt Generator
description: Creates effective prompts for AI interactions, ensuring relevance, clarity, and optimal model performance.
